name: Cool Cat's Space Adventure!
description:
(Trailer background music courtesy of DeepMusicEveryDay: https://pixabay.com/users/deepmusiceveryday-6071206/ )

'Cool Cat's Space Adventure' is a simple, multi-directional space-themed arcade shooter.

Play as Cool Cat, a cat who's too cool for school (..but he's also a cat, so he doesn't go to school.) 

Destroy all the Floating Fish before your lives run out!

Cool Cat only has three lives, so be careful with him! He's lost six already...

CONTROLS

ARROW KEYS  - Move and Rotate Cool Cat

SPACE BAR - Shoot Bullets at Floating Fish

MOST IMPORTANTLY - Have Fun!

SOCIAL MEDIA

WEBSITE

INSTAGRAM

REDBUBBLE SHOP

-- This is the first game that I have ever made. There may be some issues, but the most important thing is to just have fun. Thank you (: --
